eventDecorators.name: BlockMember
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a moderator blocked a member from a community.

eventDecorators.name: MemberNewMetadata
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a member updated its metadata.

eventDecorators.name: NewAdmin
eventDecorators.description: Usually after a governance vote. Emitted when a community's admin has been replaced by another admin.

eventDecorators.name: NewCommunity
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new community has been created.

eventDecorators.name: NewCommunityReactionSettings
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the reputation distributed per reaction is updated for a community.

eventDecorators.name: NewMaster
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new master is being added to the whitelist.

eventDecorators.name: NewMember
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new member joined a community.

eventDecorators.name: NewPost
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new post has been created.

eventDecorators.name: NewReaction
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a post has been upvoted or downvoted.

eventDecorators.name: PostArchived
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a post has been archived.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateCommunityMetadata
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the admin updated the community's metadata.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateRole
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: _getMembership
functionDecorators.description: Private: Returns the membership ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : The ID of the community for which we want to find the membership ID.

parameterDecorators.name: _member
parameterDecorators.description: : Address of the member.

functionDecorators.name: _getReputationBalance
functionDecorators.description: Private: Returns the reputation token balance of an address.

functionDecorators.name: addMaster
functionDecorators.description: Orbis admins can use this function to add another address in the admins whitelist.

parameterDecorators.name: _master
parameterDecorators.description: : The address of the user to add as an Orbis master.

functionDecorators.name: archive
functionDecorators.description: Post creators, moderators and admins can archive posts, it will still exist on the blockchain but might be removed from the UI.

parameterDecorators.name: _postID
parameterDecorators.description: : Unique ID of the post to remove.

functionDecorators.name: blockMember
functionDecorators.description: Moderators can block members from participating in a community.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : ID of the community we want to remove the member from.

parameterDecorators.name: _member
parameterDecorators.description: : Address of the member to block.

functionDecorators.name: communityReactionSettings
functionDecorators.description: Community mapping to handle reputation minted or burnt per reaction uint: community ID uint: reactionID int: amount to mint or burn (if negative).

functionDecorators.name: create
functionDecorators.description: Can be used by any user to create a new community with its own governance model and privacy type.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: : The URL for the metadata of the community (probably a JSON file on Arweave).

parameterDecorators.name: _governanceType
parameterDecorators.description: : The type of governance selected by the community's creator.

parameterDecorators.name: _privacyType
parameterDecorators.description: : The type of privacy selected by the community's creator.

parameterDecorators.name: _repTokenName
parameterDecorators.description: : Name of the token that will represent this community's reputation.

parameterDecorators.name: _repTokenSymbol
parameterDecorators.description: : Symbol of the token that will represent this community's reputation.

parameterDecorators.name: _quorum
parameterDecorators.description: : Minimum percentage of vote required for a proposal to be valid TODO: How to hanlde quorum with blacklisted users?.

functionDecorators.name: getGovernanceType
functionDecorators.description: Returns the governance type of a specific community.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : ID of the community.

functionDecorators.name: hasRole
functionDecorators.description: Checks if a member has a specific role in the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : The ID of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _member
parameterDecorators.description: : The member for whom we are checking the role.

parameterDecorators.name: _role
parameterDecorators.description: : The role we want to verify the user has.

functionDecorators.name: invite
functionDecorators.description: Community admins can't re-invite a user who left the community in the past (to avoid spam). Community admins can invite any user to join a private community as an Editor.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : Unique ID of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _member
parameterDecorators.description: : Address of the user to invite TODO: Should this be possible.

functionDecorators.name: isAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Check if a member is an admin of a specified community.

functionDecorators.name: join
functionDecorators.description: This transaction will fail if the user isn't authorized to join the community. Used by members to join a community.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : The unique ID of the community.

functionDecorators.name: memberReaction
functionDecorators.description: Keeps track of the reaction for each user per post (if 0: user never reacted).

functionDecorators.name: quit
functionDecorators.description: If a user leaves a private community he won't be able to re-join it. Users can leave a community they are part of whenever they want.

parameterDecorators.name: _membershipID
parameterDecorators.description: : The unique ID of the membership.

functionDecorators.name: react
functionDecorators.description: Used by community members (at least Editor role) to react to post shared in their communities.

parameterDecorators.name: _postID
parameterDecorators.description: : Unique ID of the post to upvote/downvote.

parameterDecorators.name: _reaction
parameterDecorators.description: : Type of reaction.

functionDecorators.name: replaceAdmin
functionDecorators.description: The replacement of the admin is taking effect immediately and can only be triggered by a governance vote. Can be called by the community's reputation token to replace the community admin after a governance vote.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: Community ID for which we are replacing the admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _oldAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the replaced admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _newAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new admin.

functionDecorators.name: reply
functionDecorators.description: Reply to an existing post.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: : The URL for the metadata of this post (probably a JSON file on Arweave).

parameterDecorators.name: _parentPostID
parameterDecorators.description: : The ID of the parent post.

functionDecorators.name: setCommunityMetadata
functionDecorators.description: Used by the community's admin to update the community's metadata.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : The unique ID of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: : The URL for the metadata of the community (probably a JSON file on Arweave).

functionDecorators.name: setCommunityReputationSettings
functionDecorators.description: Can be called by community's admin to update the distribution of reputation per reaction.

parameterDecorators.name: _labels
parameterDecorators.description: : Array of label to use for the new reactions.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: : Array of amount that should be assigned per reaction.

functionDecorators.name: setMemberMetadata
functionDecorators.description: Members can update their metadata.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: : Arweave hash to use for this member's metadata.

functionDecorators.name: setModerator
functionDecorators.description: Moderators can use this function to block/ban a member of the community they are moderating.

functionDecorators.name: share
functionDecorators.description: Share a new post in a community, only members with the Editor role can use this function.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: : Unique ID of the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: : The URL for the metadata of this post (probably a JSON file on Arweave).
